au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=L2=14m_central_12p5_jan2012
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) #sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) # Drive detector to position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(13200,0) # Drive guide to g2 config driveGuide(guideConfig.g2) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for g2) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -98) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) sics.set('beamcenterx', 98.20) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.22)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(34, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(240)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(34, 0) driveBsz(254.0)
